summary: Reduced to minding the counter at a crusty pawn shop, Weslake tumbles onto a scheme by some disgruntled misfit clients to rob the place. Rather than blow the whistle, however, he insinuates himself as the heist's mastermind.
cast: Donald Sutherland|Jack Warden|Sean Penn|Wallace Shawn|Larry Riley|Trinidad Silva|Christine Baranski|Charlayne Woodard|Tasia Valenza|Irwin Corey|Edouard DeSoto|Anna Maria Horsford|Mitchell Lichtenstein|Marjorie Eaton|Ed Call|Joseph Hindy|Charles Bouvier|Dick Bright|Paul Drake|Ed Corbett|James Edward Bryan|Darryl Henriques|Joe Bellan|Gary Ross|Maria Alcorcha|Sally Schaub|Elba Montes|Raymond Rios|James Richard Bryan|Jeffrey Weissman|Gary Guidinger
